Maxratings

Landing page
about the project

A professional service to provide reviews that show products in the best light and truly push their benefits. The goal is to ensure that costumers make informed decisions on products they should consider.

Industry: social media

Tech Stack: Project management, Back-end development, Ux/ui Design, Front-end development, motion design

Logo

With MAXRatings we went with a punchy and upfront approach, a flashy and simple branding. It inspires both confidence and professionalism.

Mobile version

With the current online landscape mobile compatibility is a must, so we make sure to deliver. With all the information smoothly laid out and accessible we can be sure our landing is successful.

THE BOTTOM LINE Apple's iPhone 13 Pro Max is the ultimate mobile content creation machine, with the best camera and longest battery life of any iPhone. The ultimate phone for photo and video creators! The iPhone 13 Pro Max (starting at $1,099) is the ultimate professional content creator's phone.
